com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning

Class NeuralNetworkQEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.NeuralNetworkQEstimator

  • public class NeuralNetworkQEstimator
extends java.lang.Object
    Estimates Q Values using a neural network for use in a QLearner.

    Author:
    Team 2412.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  NeuralNetworkQEstimator.LayerType
      Enumeration of layer types.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double[][] biases
      Biases for each node in each layer.

      The changes that were made to each weight last time.

      The data set to train on.

      The error differential for each node.
      private double[][] errors
      The errors (backpropagated) for each node.
      private int hiddenLayers
      The number of hidden layers.
      private int iterations
      The number of times to run through the data set during training.
      private double learningRate
      The weight adjustment learning rate.
      private double momentum
      Momentum constant, to prevent overfitting.
      private int numberOfInputs
      The number of input nodes in the input layer.
      private int numberOfOutputs
      The number of output nodes in the output layer.
      private int outputLayer
      The layer index of the output layer.
      private double[][] outputs
      The outputs from each node in the network.
      private int shortTermMemory
      The number of data points to store before the last set of data points is pushed out.
      private int[] sizes
      A list of the number of nodes per layer.
      private double[][][] weights
      The weights for each network connection.

    • Field Detail

      • hiddenLayers

        private final int hiddenLayers
        The number of hidden layers.

      • numberOfOutputs

        private final int numberOfOutputs
        The number of output nodes in the output layer.

      • numberOfInputs

        private final int numberOfInputs
        The number of input nodes in the input layer.

      • outputLayer

        private final int outputLayer
        The layer index of the output layer.

      • learningRate

        private double learningRate
        The weight adjustment learning rate.

      • momentum

        private double momentum
        Momentum constant, to prevent overfitting.

      • sizes

        private int[] sizes
        A list of the number of nodes per layer.

      • biases

        private double[][] biases
        Biases for each node in each layer. Biases are values added to the input of each node before being run through the sigmoid function.

      • weights

        private double[][][] weights
        The weights for each network connection.

      • outputs

        private double[][] outputs
        The outputs from each node in the network.

      • deltas

        private double[][] deltas
        The error differential for each node.

      • changes

        private double[][][] changes
        The changes that were made to each weight last time. For use in momentum calculations.

      • errors

        private double[][] errors
        The errors (backpropagated) for each node.

      • data

        private DataPoint[] data
        The data set to train on.

      • shortTermMemory

        private int shortTermMemory
        The number of data points to store before the last set of data points is pushed out.

      • iterations

        private int iterations
        The number of times to run through the data set during training.

                       int hiddenLayers,

        outputs - the number of output parameters
        hiddenLayers - the number of hidden layers
        learningRate - the learning rate

      • NeuralNetworkQEstimator

        public NeuralNetworkQEstimator(int inputs,
                       int hiddenLayers,
                       int outputs,
                       double learningRate,
                       double momentum)

        Q-Value Estimator

        Parameters:
        inputs - the number of input parameters.
        outputs - the number of output parameters.
        hiddenLayers - the number of hidden layers.
        learningRate - the learning rate.
        momentum - the adjustment momentum.
